local_intent: Detect, align, compute pinch grasp for the white plate, execute Pick using 'white_grasp', and verify stable grasp.
assumptions: Gripper is already open from upstream actions
White plate is reachable within planner limits
coherence_with_global: Uses same targets and parameters as GLOBAL_BT around the Pick step: detect -> align (0.005, 1200ms) -> compute 'pinch' grasp key 'white_grasp' -> Pick (1500ms) -> verify stability.
